[Bottled Screams](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1792)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 177</row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Geb have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The vengeful wails of a [revenant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=787), barely contained in this rattling jar, infuse your magic with all of their spite and malice. If a target fails its saving throw against your [_seal fate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=715) spell after you've added this catalyst, it takes 1d6 [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) of the type chosen for the spell (2d6 if it critically fails).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
